group_1.textRight: Oh, Himuro-dono!

group_1.textLeft: Miura? I never thought I would run into you in@such a large venue.

group_1.textRight: What a pleasant surprise to see you here.@[chara:103401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:103401:motion_0][chara:103401:lipSynch_1]Oh, and with your friend too...

group_1.textLeft: Pleased to meet you. My name is Shirogane.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much for your courtesy.@I am Asahi Miura.
I'm heading out to see the exhibition prepared@by the school committee.
If you don't mind, would you two like to join us?

group_1.textLeft: Just as well, since nothing really piqued my interest.

group_1.textRight: That's quite a blunt way of putting it...
Now that I've read about it, I find it interesting.
The geothermal cuisine and art culture of the@Yukuni Hot Springs Village are quite fascinating.

group_1.textLeft: Originally, I lived in an area that was both a hot@springs resort and an inn town.
People came and went, and some folks made@a living doing arts.
It was apparently quite colorful at one point,@as written here.

group_1.textRight: Even within the same Yukuni City, each area has@a different flavor of culture, don't they?
Those like me who live in the mountains and forests@are mostly in the forestry or hunting industry.
Nevertheless, there are many people, including my@own family, who are engaged in other occupations.

group_1.textLeft: The Fugitive Heike Clan Legend article over@here says...

group_1.textRight: Right, that would be me.
I am not sure if it is true or not, but I did find@a stone monument.

group_1.textLeft: "Oral tradition and a few references were the only@corroboration, but depending on the outcome
of the investigation, this could be an important@piece of physical evidence."
...Proof of existence.
An unperceived existence is the same as@non-existence. Just like with Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: [chara:103401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]......?!

group_1.textLeft: The person to whom I revealed my identity was@Shirogane.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: I also heard about you and Kurusu-san from@Himuro-senpai.
If there is anything I can do to help, please let@me know.
I may not have any friends, but I have no@barriers either.

group_1.textRight: ...Why did you choose to believe what Himuro-dono@told you, Shirogane-dono?

group_1.narration: "Purposeless, unrecognizable, empty beings such as ourselves@preserve themselves by being seen by many."

group_1.textLeft: That's what Himuro-senpai had told me.
It was Rabi Himuro who preserved me as an@individual.
I don't know how I can deny the existence of such@a proof of myself.

group_1.textRight: Are you saying that you trust Himuro-dono@to the end of the line?

group_1.textLeft: ...I trust her even though I know what Magical Girls@end up as.

group_1.textRight: ......[wait:0.8][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:lipSynch_1]That much...

group_1.textLeft: I don't think Shirogane should be used as a metric@for the disclosure to the public.
I believe it's only because we share a unique and@abnormal bond unlike other friendships
that she was able to accept even the fate of@Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: That I am aware of.
Perhaps I should follow up on my arrangements,@as well.

group_1.textLeft: It's about time for Kurusu to start singing.@Let's move to the stage.
